original_text: The priest will take the other bird and the wood from the cedar tree. He will take the red wool and the hyssop. He will put all of them into the blood of the dead bird.
korean_text: 다른 새는 산 채로 가져다가 백향목과 홍색 실과 우슬초와 함께 가져다가 흐르는 물 위에서 잡은 새의 피를 찍어

sentences.original_text: The priest will take the other bird
and the wood from the cedar tree
He will take the red wool
He will put all of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 모든 것들을 넣을 것이다

sentences.original_text: into the blood of the dead bird
